name: ProToFlow
description:
Generate Flow Arrows based on Prototype Interactions.

If you wish to use FigJam connectors instead of arrows, just copy a connector from FigJam to your file and give it to the plugin and see the magic.

Currently, FigJam connectors can't connect to the instance's sublayers and the plugin will use arrows as a fallback.
